attributes.action: Accept the findings of the Cambridge Primary Review (2009)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We request that the findings of the Cambridge Review of Primary schooling in England be accepted into law. The review is thorough, scholarly and forward thinking. It's basis in educational pedagogy is sound and up to date. It's findings are far more desirable than the conservative, old think displayed in the Rose review. Please accept these findings, especially on school starting age, as the result of scholarly research and as having the support of the majority of teaching professionals.
